function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of environmental health in well-being measures","Impact":"Increased risk of environmental degradation and public health issues","Mitigation":"Incorporating environmental health indicators and creating incentives for sustainable environmental practices","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring technologies, sustainable energy technologies","People":"General public, policymakers, environmental organizations","Owner":"Policymakers, environmental organizations, sustainable development professionals"},{"Description":"Overemphasis on socioeconomic welfare in well-being measures","Impact":"Neglect of environmental health and unsustainable resource consumption","Mitigation":"Incorporating environmental sustainability indicators, promoting conservation practices, and incentivizing sustainable resource use","Technologies":"Resource management technologies, sustainable agriculture technologies","People":"General public, policymakers, environmental organizations","Owner":"Policymakers, environmental organizations, sustainable development professionals"}]}
